text: Filip Trifonov () (4 May 1947 â€“ 6 January 2021) was a Bulgarian actor. He appeared in more than thirty movies. His career began in 1971. Trifonov's best known role was as Ran in the 1972 movie The Boy Turns Man. Trifonov was born in Sofia, Bulgaria. Trifonov died on 6 January 2021 from a heart attack in Sofia, aged 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Bulgarian movie actors Category:Actors from Sofia
title: Filip Trifonov
